snippet.title: Machine Heart - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Revealed during the Advanced Games Projects (AGP) Spotlight Show at USC Games Expo 2023, watch the trailer for Machine Heart. The trailer showcases two different timelines of this 2.5D puzzle adventure game: a desolate world and a neon one full of danger. In Machine Heart, you'll play as two characters in two different, but interconnected, timelines. Players will have the ability to trade clues back and forth between timelines and uncover a shocking secret behind the fate of humanity as well as all life on Earth.

#GameTrailers #Gaming
